MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY8 and KY7 postcode areas of Leven and Glenrothes. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.00am, this is to safely carry out tree cutting near to Carriston Reservoir and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:27am on Wednesday, 21 October 2020.
